Description:
Robot that will appear rappelling down when triggered.
Class: Machine.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to start rappelling. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
You can choose which weapon the monster uses (HG = Hand Grenade, GL= M16 Grenade Launcher e.t.c.).
Change model display sequence in editor by specifying it's number.
